title: Visit to Riot HQ
body: hey riot im visiting LA from the 6/31/2017 through the 7/4/2017 for anime expo. I am coming from NC which is on the opposite side of the US and I wanna come visit riot HQ but there is no tour scheduled. can I come on one of those dates please. I really have loved the game and I've been playing since the end of season 2 please help me see the place and the game i enjoy every day.

replies.body: Hmmmm I noticed that there weren't any [**tours scheduled**](https://www.riotgames.com/tours/schedule) while you would be in town =\ . You can always shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's any way we could work one on one with you though!

I just sent in a ticket and thank you i thought no one would read this post :). I really wanna come see the HQ and bask in the glory of RIOT and this is the perfect opportunity especially since this is my first time visiting the west coast in my life. me and my friends would be so happy if you guys at riot could make this happen and if you do I will not only get to gold but I will strive for plat this season :)
